', u'yum update -y aws-cfn-bootstrap
', u'# Install Apache
', u'/opt/aws/bin/cfn-init --stack ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::StackName'}, u' --resource BackendLaunchConfig ', u'    --access-key ', {u'Ref': u'HostKeys'}, u'    --secret-key ', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'HostKeys', u'SecretAccessKey']}, u'    --url https://stackbuilder.amazonaws.com ', u'    --region ', {u'Ref': u'AWS::Region'}, u'
', u'# Signal completion
